attributes.action: to change the laws for animal cruelty so the punishment for doing so is the same or similar to those of doing the equivalent to a human.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Every year defenceless animals are hurt or die through negligence of their owner/person or even with intent by fighting animals. For example, in 2006 a man got the current maximum sentence of 6 MONTHS and life ban on keeping animals for the deaths of 29 animals in his care.

If this was a person, they would have got life or if in the USA "the death sentence". As these animals don’t have a voice, it is our responsibility to protect them. Let’s change the law so these heartless people get greater punishments for what they do!

rejection.details:
Here is a link to the existing petition:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/crueltyanimals/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
